title: ASX logo
content:
Im looking for something simmilar to this, it does not have to be an exact match, I just like the feeling of the ASX letters. Thank you!

 [‹ Modern Sans Serif (looks like Metroflex) - Please help ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208135423/http:/typophile.com/node/39741 "Go to previous forum topic") [Design Observer Font - Proxima Nova? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208135423/http:/typophile.com/node/39783 "Go to next forum topic")
author: plojel

comments.content: Quick as a brown fox! Thank you. Jan, please translate for a novis.
I was to correct Arun (I think he said Rotis Sans first), but he corrected himself (I guess). It’s the Semi Sans. So I erased my post. (You can’t delete it completely.)
I see, thank you for explaining.
